name: ERRATUM- Horror Escape Room Puzzle Game
name_original: ERRATUM- Horror Escape Room Puzzle Game
description:
You wake up in an abandoned research facility. The rooms are empty, the silence echoes off of the blood-soaked walls. Effigies and symbols coat most open surfaces; offerings to an unknown God perhaps?    

Though the corridors are barren, something just out of your vision is stalking them, in search of something.    

In search of you.    

Uncover the mysteries of this wasteland of despair; explore the haunted halls and complete puzzles to find a way out, while learning more about the world you've been thrown into and getting answers you may not even want to know.

---------------------------------------------------

ERRATUM is an escape room horror puzzle game made by BLANK Games, as part of the Games Design and Production undergraduate degree at the University of Salford.
